website_summaries.verdict: This supplement does a good job of curbing your desire to eat between meals and doesn't make you feel on edge.
pros: Doesn't cause users to feel jittery or upset stomach
Seems to work on belly fat
cons: Does not seem to work for everyone

customer_reviews.title: I have lost 8 pounds in the past month while ...
customer_reviews.text: I have lost 8 pounds in the past month while taking this for before breakfast and dinner. I am sure that I would have lost more, if I would not eat the carbs I have, but those darned girl scouts and their cookies... haha Now that I am done eating gs cookies I look forward to the weight I can lose with out the extra temptation. Thank you for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Billie

customer_reviews.title: Losing weight has been a struggle of mine so I've ...
customer_reviews.text: Losing weight has been a struggle of mine so I've been trying to find something that had pure ingredients to help without making me sick. This supplement is on that I take before my largest meal of the day and I've noticed that I gain more energy throughout the day and I am able to keep up with my toddler. This supplement is a safe way to lose weight but it isn't fast weight loss.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: I really feel like this works!
customer_reviews.text: So I had lost a few pounds and then got stuck at a plateau. I thought this may be a good kickstarter for me, and it really was! I ordered on March 18th so I have been taking it about 2 weeks now. I have lost around 4 lbs, which may not sound like much, but I had been stuck for weeks, so it was a big deal for me. I have changed nothing else about my diet. I also have not been exercising (but I'm gonna start, I promise!). I will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have finally lost those stubborn 6 pounds that I've been trying to lose for almost a year! This product really stopped all my cravings for snacks. I take it in the morning when I get up with eight ounces of water then wait an hour. And do the ame thing before dinner. I am very very pleased with this product. No jitters no light headedness no nothing but results
customer_reviews.author: Khale

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work as described
customer_reviews.text: Took a full bottle as recommended before posting this review and regretfully I did not see any weight loss or feel any effects like more energy or curbing of appetite as product description claims.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore J. Matela III

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: I brought one bottle nothing not even a pound instead I gained 5 pounds. I figured I would buy another bottle because I figured it’s an adjustment period. I gain 5 more pounds. I changed my diet, exercise and drank tons of water nothing. I have been off them for a week or so and I loss 2 pounds 8 more to go to get were I started. A waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must try.
customer_reviews.text: While I can't go any significant weight loss testimonial, this product when taken early in the morning helps keep me full the whole day. Yes, I still eat regular meals but the potion has lessened. Easy to swallow and doesn't not have any after taste like most supplements have. It is also easy on the tummy. I take it on an empty stomach and it does not cause bloating or upsets my stomach at all.
customer_reviews.author: TheFrugalistaMom

customer_reviews.title: I have been using the Garcinia Cambodia for a week ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the Garcinia Cambodia for a week, and honestly I am feeling more energetic and have less aches and pains. I will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Blevins

customer_reviews.title: Totally Helps
customer_reviews.text: Nothing will replace getting some good 'ol exercise...... However, this will definitely help you get closer to your gal, faster. Two a day, any part of the day (I do it as soon as i get to work) is super easy to do, and the pills are easy to swallow... I have lost 12 lbs already and I eat like crap, and only workout like 15 min each morning... Perfect in my book.
customer_reviews.author: sychoblondii

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I dont really write reviews,but this is my second bottle of garcinia and I absolutely love this stuff. With correct diet and exercise I am down 10 pounds in 3 weeks and I'm very happy. Hope this review helps.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to replace my Thrive patches. They gave me energy, but the rashes I got from them were intolerable. I am also sensitive to caffeine and the Thrive patches have guarana in them which is like caffeine on steroids! I saw that garcinia cambogia was the other main ingredient and decided to try this. It is accomplishing everything I wanted from the patches...energy, metabolism support, digestion...and now I don't need the patches. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Filipski

customer_reviews.title: I found that these pills do curve my appetite, ...
customer_reviews.text: I found that these pills do curb my appetite, but once they wear off, it comes back with a vengeance.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Money back guarantee?
customer_reviews.text: I started developing a rash as soon as I started taking these. I’ve taken Garcinia before and have never had a reaction. At first I thought it was my makeup so I purchased new skin care, new foundation, new brush/sponge cleaners and still the same. Took Benadryl and it went away. Tried taking the pills again and again with the irritated skin. Stop taking it altogether and haven’t had a problem since. I reported the issued and was thanked for the feedback...nothing about money back.
customer_reviews.author: daizy lee

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to help me with my snack cravings between meals. I ordered these over the other brands because of the great reviews and the money back guarantee. So far so good. I've been taking these as directed for the past 5 days. I do feel like I'm snacking less and my jeans already feel looser but it could be the placebo effect. I will definitely upday at the end of the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! I work in a restaurant, and all I want to do is eat when I'm not busy. I've not been happy with myself, so I started looking for something to help me take away the urge to eat when I'm not hungry. I've been taking two of these a day, and I don't feel like I need to have something to eat in front of me all the time. And as an added bonus, I feel more energized and less moody when I take these consistently.
customer_reviews.author: Ghee Buttersnaps

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work at all.
customer_reviews.text: Did nothing for me. Let’s face it. Weight loss will never be in a bottle.
customer_reviews.author: REVIEWER71

customer_reviews.title: Skeptic turned repeat customer!
customer_reviews.text: I waited until I finished an entire bottle before writing a review. I’ve never had much trouble losing weight with a healthy diet and moderate exercise. However, recently after gaining some weight, I realized the weight was not coming off. I did blood tests, further adjusted my diet, tried new workout routines, tried digestive enzymes, and the scale WOULD NOT budge. After some research, I came upon this product. I take one before breakfast and lunch and two with dinner. In 3 weeks, I’ve dropped 5lbs just by pairing it with my diet and exercise routine. I’m definitely purchasing again in hopes of getting down to my goal weight. Worth a try if everything else is failing you!
customer_reviews.author: AlyG

customer_reviews.title: hungrier than usual
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this, but it had the opposite of the desired effect on me. I didn't feel any more energized, but I was STARVING all morning and afternoon, even after eating. Made it harder to control my calorie intake and get through my day than usual.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great supplement
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product off and on for several years. I lost 100 lbs about five years ago, and since then I have worked hard to maintain my weight and live a healthy lifestyle. Sometimes I need a little help with maintenance, and whenever I want to give my metabolism a boost I use Garcinia Cambogia for a few months. This is not a diet pill and it's not a quick fix, but it's a valuable component within a balanced health and weight loss/maintenance plan.
customer_reviews.author: Historian

customer_reviews.title: Good for Healthy Weight Loss
customer_reviews.text: Helped my husband and I lose about 15 lbs. Neither of us had any negative side effects. We take it as part of a healthy supplement regiment. He takes it when he eats carbs especially.
customer_reviews.author: FairLadyinSoCal

customer_reviews.title: Dors not work in 1 month but maybe 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if this bottle worked, I think it had to be taken for longer period of time to see affects. I did not get s free bottle of this so therefore I can post an honest review. I took for 1 month and will be future to see if I get results.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Still working on it
customer_reviews.text: I do like the product. Have noticed some change on my belly getting smaller. If it keeps this up I will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: petra champion

customer_reviews.title: Not good for everyone
customer_reviews.text: I see NOTHING this product has done I don’t understand where the good reviews are coming from
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Works best with 6-8 glasses of water a day
customer_reviews.text: Almost completed my first bottle unfortunately i didn’t weigh myself before i got started but i have definitely noticed a difference in my water weight, bloating, and the way my clothes fit my husbands commented on my new “hourglass” figure returning and received many other compliments that ive trimmed down helps with chocolate cravings and helps me know when Im full great value for the price and i plan on continuing these throughout the summer to help me stay on track for reference im about 165-180 and goal to be back around 135-140 at 5 foot tall
customer_reviews.author: Grace Baja

customer_reviews.title: Nicely packaged with double safety seal and outer box
customer_reviews.text: I received my first bottle today. On the bottle there is an offer for a free bottle from the company! That’s pretty cool. Very easy to swall and I did not detect any odor. I took these pills about ten years ago with gret success and no jitters or side effects. I am eating healthy and working out. I will repost my success after bottle #1 is complete.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great for a new mom with few meal opportunities
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product. Really wasn't looking for a miracle pill...just something that kept my appetite at bay on the long days of caring for our newborn, who isn't particularly concerned with when MOM gets to eat ;-) Found this to be super helpful in keeping blood sugar from dropping and my mood from dipping whenever breakfast came a little too late, or lunch had to be skipped altogether. Will order again!
customer_reviews.author: Rupp423

customer_reviews.title: Another false prophet
customer_reviews.text: Yeah no dont buy it. Still searching for that random brand i bought 5 years ago that helped me lose 20lbs. cant remember the name. These are just placebos and its not worth my time to return for a refund. i just wish there was a legit brand out there that actually put the time, effort, and ingredients into their product to make it live up to its advertisement. These have absolutely no effect on me, no matter which dose i take, no matter the time of day, no matter how close or long before a meal. I will say the apple cider pills seem to be working though.
customer_reviews.author: jules

customer_reviews.title: Jumpstart to healthy weight loss
customer_reviews.text: Great product to help jumpstart weight loss. If you maintain a healthy and clean diet, this will help you lose extra weight as well. I like how this product is all natural and doesn’t give you jitters. This product helped me jumpstart and I’m going to keep using it. It’s great for energy as well.
customer_reviews.author: RogandNell

customer_reviews.title: Extremely good product
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Im very happy with this product. It has done what it has claimed to do and that is exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Edder A. Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Two days into this and so far so great! No jitters! I feel full and cravings are cut tremendously. Down a little over 1 pound and I haven't exercised. I'll keep going with this and post more later. Hoping to lose over the holidays so I don't gain! lol Works for me!
customer_reviews.author: Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Not enough Garcinia
customer_reviews.text: This is a poor product. I didn't see any results.
customer_reviews.author: Willie 14

customer_reviews.title: In one week I've noticed a slight boost in my energy level.
customer_reviews.text: Have not seen any weight loss yet but have only been using for a week. I have noticed a slight boost in my energy level though and I'm looking forward to seeing what continued use in the mourning with raw apple cider vinegar, honey and green tea will have.
customer_reviews.author: timothy dickerson

customer_reviews.title: THANK YOU!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for a legit one for a few years now, since the last brand went out of business. Even though it's 50% this works better then the stuff that say 90%. Thank you! Please don't go anywhere. I lost 4 lbs in the first week.
customer_reviews.author: momof3

customer_reviews.title: Really does work as an appetite suppressant!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, but this works! It suppresses your appetite effectively, so it’s easier to slow down and really think about what I’m eating!
customer_reviews.author: amymom

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff, when I take it, it helps curb my appetite. I haven't been very active lately but I'm still not gaining weight.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be worth the hype...
customer_reviews.text: I started taking Garcinia 4 days ago and can already see some changes. I do a lot of cardio classes and since l started taking these supplements l seem to be sweating a lot more during exercises. I also seem to be sleeping better since l started taking them. So far so good and lm only taking half the dose daily. I cant wait to see the final results.
customer_reviews.author: Tariro

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Work
customer_reviews.text: Took for a week and ate more than when I wasn't taking them. Will try again but not hopeful.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jones

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: So far I’m liking this product. I’ve been taking it for 4 days and have already lost a few pounds. I’ve been taking one in the morning and one in the evening with dinner, today I took both in the morning to see if it helps me sleep better tonight. I’ve also changed my diet to more salads, less burgers 😣 first wedding anniversary is coming up, I want to look my best!
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Didn't do a thing
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking this for 3 weeks, watching what I eat & exercising with zero results.
customer_reviews.author: DustyG

customer_reviews.title: Careful with migraine meds
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Didn’t give me the shakes or make me feel hungry. If it boosts serotonin, make sure you don’t take triptan drugs for migraines. Can lead to serotonin syndrome.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher A. Yount

customer_reviews.title: Not a miracle but works
customer_reviews.text: It does work if you take consistently. It can cause a jittery type effect from the ingredients. The taste of these capsules is not the best though. Makes them hard to swallow. But no one said weight loss is easy!
customer_reviews.author: Penelope Rouse

customer_reviews.title: Questionable...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second product I’ve tried to lose just a little bit more amount of weight to get to my goal and this product makes me feel very drowsy compared to the previous product I’ve tried... and neither have I seen changes in my weight. Tried it for 3 weeks now. Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Weight loss
customer_reviews.text: I’ve just had them a few days but they seem to be curbing my appetite, I’ll get back to you in a month.
customer_reviews.author: Camille Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Fair price and a good quality supplement
customer_reviews.text: i feel this product meets expectations of the aid to health it claims. I will be a regular customer unless something changes from the positive results I feel.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing happened
customer_reviews.text: does nothing have try it for a few day and nothing have changed still the same. what a Disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: juan

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work
customer_reviews.text: Easy to swallow and no taste or after taste. Seems to curb appetite. Paired with clean eating and exercise, I’ve lost a few pounds and inches. Not a ‘miracle pill’ but worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher King

customer_reviews.title: Not a quick fix
customer_reviews.text: This product is helping me keep me at my current weight, I haven’t seen any weight changes just yet but it hasn’t been the full month yet, I do feel a little more energized throughout the day and I’m able to keep up with my daily activities without burnout
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Does what it’s supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Definitely suppressed my appetite. I found myself less hungry than prior to using. Would def recommend for weight loss
customer_reviews.author: Kim Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product! I think this has really helped with ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Product! I think this has really helped with my weight loss. It has given me the energy to workout as well which of course helps too. I believe it’s a clean product. It’s only 50% vs the 90%+ I see some other brands and I like that smaller does.
customer_reviews.author: AeKeenan

customer_reviews.title: Two at a Time
customer_reviews.text: Taking two at a time works best! When I take two I don’t feel hungry and I don’t even think about food. I’m rather small but this product is helping me lose the extra stubborn fat I have. I’ve lost 6lbs in about two weeks. From 140 to 134. I’m a 5’6 girl.
customer_reviews.author: Britni

customer_reviews.title: So excited
customer_reviews.text: Well I just received it due to seeing such great great reviews , I’m incredibly excited to start I’m now waiting on receiving apple cider vinegar pills to take along with it as well since I’ve read it’s a great combo. I will update and add my results after week 1-2 and so on and so forth
customer_reviews.author: valerie

customer_reviews.title: capsule product review
customer_reviews.text: i didn't lose any weight for the whole 2 or 3 weeks and i also didn't see a lot of changes.i walked and jog a little and a little weight lifting here and there but still no changes. i think this product is made for athletes if there consistently moving their body like crazy 24/7. instead of buying this product i suggest people just buy the fruit and eat it.
customer_reviews.author: Watashi

customer_reviews.title: and I love the effects
customer_reviews.text: I take one garcinia cambogia tablet in the morning with an apple cider vinegar tablet and a large glass of water, and I love the effects. Besides helping with my digestion, it helps cut down my snacking tendencies. After breakfast, I’m full and satisfied. Feeling good about this product so far!
customer_reviews.author: Melsey23

customer_reviews.title: No Bloating
customer_reviews.text: As a fitness competitor, reducing inflammation is key. Although my food intake consists mostly from plants, I used this product to help me reduce the swelling in my legs from standing most of the day. I liked it very much. As a nutritionist, I read the ingredients and I like how complete their products are, and the quality is top notch. Thank you for your products. I am a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Francesca

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This worked at first and then nothing. I took it for 2 months and it gave me energy but no significant weight loss.

customer_reviews.title: Will take it longer
customer_reviews.text: Been using for about a month and it’s ok, will try for another month and see I notice better results.

customer_reviews.title: Really like this product as it gives me the extra energy ...
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product as it gives me the extra energy and seems to curb my cravings without giving me the jitters like so many other products do. Hopefully it will also help me lose a few pounds :)

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this product!

customer_reviews.text: I am glad I found this. After my pregnancy I was finding it difficult to reduce my bloating. At least I don’t feel bloated anymore.

For the price I a really excited to see the results, followed by good diet and exercise. I am giving it 4 stars bc I just got them and still don’t know what the complete result will be but I’ll be updating after I finish the bottle.

customer_reviews.title: Curbs appetite immediately!

This brand doesn't make me feel queasy and I think this is the better choice on the market. I would suggest that you give it 90 days to measure results. I think this is a good product.

customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a few days now and it really helps me not feel hungry! It completely curves my appetite for hours. Will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: ... garcinia cambogia for three months and the results are amazing, I no longer have that anxiety to eat
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking garcinia cambogia for three months and the results are amazing, I no longer have that anxiety to eat, I have lost weight, and the fat in my tummy is gone, now I feel much more energized and super happy because I can use again My dresses that I like so much.
customer_reviews.author: Milka Sepulveda

customer_reviews.title: I have been using for two weeks and the vitamins ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using for two weeks and the vitamins really seem to be helping with my appetite. I plan on continuing to use this product for a few months.
customer_reviews.author: HJP

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely helps curb my appetite! Not a miracle pill, you'll still want to eat healthy and exercise of course helps as well.
customer_reviews.author: Leah G.

customer_reviews.title: Has helped with my energy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only use for a week so I think is a short time to see big results about weight but I’ve noticed a boost on my energy levels during the day
customer_reviews.author: Gleysis Maza

customer_reviews.title: Easy to take
customer_reviews.text: I have lost some inches and about 7lbs in the month I've taken the supplement. It does help with controlling my appetite, especially on the days I fast. I take them in the morning with water and coffee and I can go about my day without any hunger pains. Will def. purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work.
customer_reviews.text: Zero results. I have used Garcinia Cambodia before/ different brand. Had gotten great results. Had this for a week, and has zero appetite control. I am taking 4 tablets , twice a day. Still no effect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I took as directed, did not suppress my appetite at all. Keep my same gym schedule and daily routines. Was hoping this product would curb my appetite between meals but did nothing at all. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer!
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this supplement for a couple days now and I think it is really helping suppress my appetite! Quality product and works as described so far.
customer_reviews.author: River Weeks

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I was on the fence with taking any diet pill. However I decided to give it a shot and was not disappointed. Although I have seen a huge different in weight loss besides a pound or two. My biggest result so far has been having more energy and less of the constant hunger.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Reviews aren’t belivable
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t notice anything. I have even broke the capsule open and took two that way, still nothing. Requesting money back since they advertise money back guarantee. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy S.

customer_reviews.title: Boosted my energy the first week
customer_reviews.text: I have noticed a visible difference since using this product right away. I have lost a bunch of water weight, hold consistent energy throughout the day and haven't had as many snack cravings as I usually do. The belly fat still has yet to shed off, but I need to do a better job exercising that area.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney P Manlove

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product, fast results
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It's so easy to take, simply take two pills a day and you won't feel hungry again!! Sometimes I have to remind myself to eat!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri McCrill

customer_reviews.title: Very useful to break fasting
customer_reviews.text: No flavor, I have been taken once I woke up with caffeine and i for great results!
customer_reviews.author: Jose Angelo Gianotto Junior

product_meta.title: Garcinia Cambogia - by Vitamin Bounty - 100% Pure Extract - 60 Count - 1000mg
feature_bullets: Vitamin Bounty Garcinia Cambogia is the Highest-quality blend of Garcinia Cambogia Extract. Designed and developed by a team of specialists in health and personal care field, Vitamin Bounty’s Garcinia Cambogia is formulated to assist in supercharging your health goals.
Money Back Guarantee. If you are not happy with your bottle of Garcinia Cambogia, just reach out to us and we will do what it takes to make you happy.
Each batch of Vitamin Bounty Garcinia Cambogia is tested for potency, and standardized to 50% HCA, which is the measure for efficacy.
Made in the USA, and bottled in a NSF certified facility, Vitamin Bounty’s Garcinia Cambogia is a worry-free choice.
